name: fleshed flat roof
description: A flat, rooftop, covered in gorey flesh.
//: Flesh version of terrains has +3 move cost.

bash.//: Flesh terrains' str_min and _max has +5 bash resistance.

name: fleshed wall
description: A typical wall, now covered in membranous veins, flesh and swollen warts of some sort.

name: fleshed window
description: Webs of vein blocks the entirety of the glass, making it useless to see through unless you break it.

name: fleshed window frame
description: A window frame, splattered with blood and ripped veins in its jagged shards of glass.

name: fleshed wood door
description: A standard door that is covered in thick, fleshy veins.

name: fleshed wood door
description: A standard door that is covered in thick, fleshy veins. You can barely see a deadbolt keyhole, though you can't do anything without removing all the gore sticking into it.

name: fleshed floor
description: This floor has been infested by flesh strands, like roots digging deep in small gaps.

name: fleshed rock floor
description: Sticky webs of flesh strand reaches down from the ceiling into the floor.

name: fleshed stairs
description: A flight of stairs leading down, except the fact that it is overrun by flesh.

name: fleshed stairs
description: A flight of stairs leading up, except the fact that it is overrun by flesh.

//: Since terrains are not capable to act as emitters, we use an invincible, but flammable furniture for the solution.
name: flesh wart
description: A tiny wart, but for its size, it can spread a vast amount of noxious gas into the air. Destroying it is a challenge, as it grows back on the spot.

//: Starting here are the furnitures and terrains seen in flesh forest.
name: fleshed dirt
description: It's dirt, but covered in bloody veins.

name: fleshed grass
description: A cluster of tiny tentacles used to be the wild patch of living grass.

name: fleshed long grass
description: A cluster of long, writhing tendrils about shin high.

name: fleshed tall grass
description: A cluster of tall, writhing tendrils about head high.

name: fleshed shrub
description: A small shrub, now a dense tendril cluster.

name: fleshed young tree
description: Devoured by the flesh, this young sapling has its twigs covered in membranous veins and blood-dripping gore as its leaves.

name: fleshed tree
description: A fully grown tree, standing tall even though its already been overwhelmed by the flesh.

name: fleshed flower
description: This flower has fallen to the grasp of the crimson horrors.

name: fleshed small boulder
description: A small rock that has succumbed to the flesh.

name: fleshed medium boulder
description: A rock that has succumbed to the flesh.

name: fleshed large boulder
description: A large rock that has succumbed to the flesh.

//: Flesh forest's terrestrial body parts. Here we encounter LOTS of FF's abominations.
name: flesh
description: Disgusting mounds of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This pinkish flesh is rotten to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

name: flesh wall
description: Disgusting wall of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This compact lumps of flesh is sinister to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

name: vein wall
description: A wall composed of vein-like tendrils, seemingly made on the fly.

name: fleshed tree
description: A fully grown tree, standing tall even though its already been overwhelmed by the flesh. Within a closer look, its branches and stems seem to move independently.

name: flesh
description: Disgusting mounds of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This pinkish flesh is rotten to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

name: veinhole
description: A dead veinhole, now a harmless opening revealing a hollow hole. Sure it is gross, but there's no other way...

name: veinhole
description: A dead veinhole's inner orifice that leads to the surface. Sure it is gross, but there's no other way...

name: veinhole
description: An immature veinhole. It throbs calmly. Sure it is gross, but there's no other way...

name: veinhole
description: An immature veinhole's inner orifice that leads to the surface. Sure it is gross, but there's no other way...

name: hatched flesh sack
description: A flesh sack with its vented mouth opened widely. You may want to destroy it as soon as possible.

name: tendril cluster
description: A patch of large, writhing tentacles sprouting from both ground and ceiling. Within a closer look, these tentacles are trying to form into one. You may want to destroy it as soon as possible.

name: mouth slit
description: A mouth slit. With enough courage, you can slip through it and will lead you to the depths.

name: mouth slit
description: A mouth slit. With enough courage, you can climb up by grabbing at its flabby, slimy flesh edges.

name: bony outgrowths
description: A mound of flesh full of prickly sharp bones, emerging from underneath, so watch where you step!

name: tendril outgrowths
description: A patch of densely-crowded tendrils. These are short, but can grab firmly so watch where you step!

//: Another type of floor augmented with traps by the flesh.
name: flesh
description: A thick layer of meat that throbs at a faster rate, yet shares similarities to the normal flesh.

name: flesh wall
description: Disgusting wall of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This compact lumps of flesh is sinister to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

name: flesh wall
description: Disgusting wall of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This compact lumps of flesh is sinister to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

name: flesh
description: Disgusting mounds of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This pinkish flesh is rotten to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

name: flesh
description: Disgusting mounds of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This pinkish flesh is rotten to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

name: flesh wall
description: Disgusting wall of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This compact lumps of flesh is sinister to the core. This flesh is underdeveloped, and a simple bash would take it down.

name: flesh
description: Disgusting mounds of meat, slimy and organic as it seems to live. This pinkish flesh is rotten to the core, and setting it on fire may not be the cure.

//: Destroy these to prevent them from spawning veinstalks.
name: veinbush
description: A short, compact bush of living eyed tentacles bursting out of the ground. It stares ominously at the surroundings...

name: gangrenous tumor
description: A large tumor sprouting from the flesh, reeking horrible stench that spreads through a wide area.

name: flesh core
description: A large slab of flesh that shines a faint, ominous crimson hue.

name: fleshed white wall
description: Wall painted white, adorned by gore and veins.

name: fleshed green wall
description: Wall painted green, adorned by gore and veins.

name: fleshed red wall
description: Wall painted red, adorned by gore and veins.

name: fleshed blue wall
description: Wall painted blue, adorned by gore and veins.

name: fleshed brick wall
description: A solid brick wall, sturdy enough to support a roof with enough walls and keep out any unwanted visitors.

name: fleshed stone wall
description: An even sturdier stone wall covered by the flesh.

name: fleshed metal bars
description: Heavy bars overrun by the flesh. Nearly impenetrable due to the thick veins covering it.

name: fleshed glass wall
description: A wall of glass with flesh covering the entirety of its surface, blocking the vision through it.

name: fleshed glass door
description: A glass door overrun by the flesh. You can't go through it unless...

name: fleshed concrete
description: A concrete with thick, membranous veins all over it.

name: fleshed sidewalk
description: A pavement infected with flesh, with thick veins digging through the cracks.

name: fleshed pavement
description: A segment of asphalt, with thick veins running across the cracks.

name: fleshed yellow pavement
description: The lines of yellow marks are barely visible underneath the thick membranous veins.

name: fleshed concrete floor
description: A concrete floor with flesh all over it.

//: These are used in flesh cities to keep players from climbing a building (rooftops are complicated)
name: fleshed ladder
description: A ladder with gore and veins blocking the way.

name: fleshed stairs
description: A flight of stairs heavily infested by the flesh. The path is blocked, and is impossible to go through.

name: fleshed downspout
description: A gutter with overgrown tendrils groping from top to bottom. Its slimy texture makes it slippery.

name: railing
description: A wooden railing infested by the flesh.

name: fleshed metal door
description: A steel door that can withstand more punishment with the flesh covering it.

name: fleshed metal door
description: A steel door that can withstand more punishment with the flesh covering it. It is also locked.

name: fleshed red carpet
description: Soft red carpet overrun by gore and veins.

name: fleshed yellow carpet
description: Soft yellow carpet overrun by gore and veins.

name: fleshed green carpet
description: Soft green carpet overrun by gore and veins.

name: fleshed purple carpet
description: Soft purple carpet overrun by gore and veins.

name: fleshed linoleum tile
description: A tough, white, rubbery floor infested by flesh.

name: fleshed linoleum tile
description: A tough, gray, rubbery floor infested by flesh.

name: fleshed picket fence
description: A barrier made of wood, it's nothing complicated.  Mildly suggests where not to go.

name: fleshed column
description: A concrete column, covered in flesh.

name: fleshed broken console
description: This is a standalone computer terminal that is beyond broken. Veins crawl through the monitor.

name: fleshed computer console
description: This is a standalone computer terminal. Veins crawl through the monitor, but seems to work in its current condition.

name: fleshed mechanical winch
description: This is a gate control winch. Thich tendrils cover the handle, if removed, it may be usable.

name: fleshed mechanical winch
description: This is a gate control winch. Thich tendrils cover the handle, if removed, it may be usable.

name: fleshed ATM
description: With flesh covering the entire mechanism, you can't do anything useful...

name: flesh high stained glass window
description: An emerald-stained window covered in flesh.

name: flesh high stained glass window
description: A ruby-stained window covered in flesh.

name: flesh high stained glass window
description: An sapphire-stained window covered in flesh.

name: fleshed window frame with metal bars
description: A windom frame with steel bars and a giant sheet of glass shrouded in bloody veins.

name: fleshed chain link fence
description: A chain link fence with its patterned holes blocked with thick flesh.

name: fleshed wire gate
description: A chain gate with flesh covering most of the hole. It has a visible padlock mechanism, and opening it may require you to remove all the gore in it.

name: fleshed wire gate
description: A chain gate with flesh covering most of the hole.

name: fleshed pink wall
description: Wall painted pink, adorned by gore and veins.

name: fleshed reinforced glass door
description: A reinforced glass door infested by flesh. Opening it might be a minor problem...

name: fleshed brick wall
description: A sturdy brick wall with veins digging through the gaps, forming odd patterns.

name: fleshed concrete wall
description: An already unpleasant wall infected by the flesh.

name: fleshed metal wall
description: A thick, blast-proof metal wall overrun by the flesh. Now you've got more time to take it down.

name: fleshed metal floor
description: A metal floor overrun by horrid crimson flesh.

name: fleshed reinforced glass
description: Thick, durable pane of reinforced glass infested by flesh. Not only it is tough, it completely blocks the vision through it.

name: fleshed water dispenser
description: A machine with several taps that dispenses clean water. Although, the flesh clogs the dispenser, rendering it useless.

name: fleshed ballistic glass
description: Overrun by the flesh, this stacked up laminated glass is much tougher than before.

name: card reader
description: This is a smartcard reader. Engraved is a text saying "Secronom Project" underneath a biohazard symbol. You'll definitely need a special keycard of some sort to unlock the door.
//: Secronom. You'll find the keycard in the secronom lab.

name: biohazard metal door
description: A galvanized steel door, forged to withstand punishment and impede anyone or anything. Typically used in conjunction with automated electronic locking mechanisms that require an external source to unlock. It has a biohazard symbol and a card reader embedded to the door labeled "Level 1 clearance".

name: biohazard metal door
description: A galvanized steel door, forged to withstand punishment and impede anyone or anything. Typically used in conjunction with automated electronic locking mechanisms that require an external source to unlock. It has a biohazard symbol depicting something unearthly on the other side... as the flesh fibers crawl out of the edges. A card reader is embedded to the door, and it requires a special key card for it to open.

name: experimental vat
description: A large vat full of yellowish solution. Flesh seems to surround the glass tube, as if they are concealing something...
